content: पुरोधा {c3c} <ab>U.</ab> {@--1@} To place or put in the front or at the head, make as a leader; तुरासाहं पुरोधाय धाम स्वायंभुवं ययुः <ls>Ku. 2. 1</ls>; <ls>R. 12. 43.</ls> {@--2@} To make a family-priest of any one. {@--3@} To appoint, place in office. {@--4@} To entrust or charge with. {@--5@} To place or set before or in front. {@--6@} To honor, esteem, respect. {@--7@} To devote or apply oneself to. {@--8@} To think, ponder over.
पुरोधा {@--1@} The office of a {%purohita%}. {@--2@} Charge, commission. {@--3@} Representation.
